response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique offering that I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a purchase price of $12,000. This price reflects the quality of the product and its potential impact on your business. I trust this offer will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing how we can proceed.", "product_price": 12000}
